fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Declare a target during the day. This cannot be done in your private channel, only in the day chat by sending a message that contains the word "target", "choose", "select", "kill", "attack" (other words may be allowed by host discretion) and the name of the player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The following night after declaring a target, you will attack them. You cannot be affected negatively in any way by them. If you are attacked, even if you are protected, your attack will be halted.
- Control, Roleblock, Redirection immune.
